review_data.title: Best Yooji’s in Zurich
review_data.content: Not only the staff is super friendly, but also the food quality is really good. They make an effort to propose more creative and fresh dishes than in the other Yooji’s from ZH. Plus the music choice was great, so it’s definitely my favorite! :)

review_data.title: Love the food, excellent service
review_data.content: The atmosphere is really warm and welcoming, the staff are so friendly & helpful. This branch of Yooji's is the best we've been to so far.

review_data.title: Perfect Japanese food
review_data.content: I keep on returning to Yooshi's Joseph because I appreciate their client friendly opening hours and their high quality standard. Sashimi, spicy tuna or shrimp tatar, salad rolls and their soups: I was never disappointed here!
